name: FreeOpen source for developing countries
short_description:
This project website will be an international forum where developing Countries can expose they different ICT4D project about e-Gov,e-Health,e-Agriculture and ICT4Education then volunteers OSS Expert from around the world they will be contributing giving advisor,expertise or any kind of help which we can help developing Countries to achieve those project.
Online training,seminar and workshop can be provided to this website as materials tools  for skills update.

Thanks
summary: How developing countries can use Free OSS to implement ICT4D projects
